text:
@NYGovCuomo CEVIK: ...a recent study from China where they identified an infected case who's working in the supermarket, and they followed up 8,000 contacts of this person...What they found was if you're a supermarket client, your chance of getting infected is 0.02%.

https://t.co/Wlh8RZQuUd
